text: @AC360 @andersoncooper I think what bothers me most is that every instance of CNN’s mention of “wuhan coronavirus” etc was before Feb 11, which was when the disease was given its official name. There’s no need to use the older names, and yet we’re still seeing it happen. It’s intentionally provocative.
